article_title: 43 States Fail To Provide Doctor Quality Information

article_metadata.description: Despite moves by health insurers and the federal government toward providing publicly available information on physicians, most states fail when it comes to doctor transparency, a new report shows. The Health Care Incentives Improvement Institute flunked 40 states and the District of Columbia with a grade of “F” while three other states [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
